record.field:
route = env['edi.route'].sudo().search([('id', '=', env['ir.model.data'].xmlid_to_res_id('edi_af_officer.get_officer_route'))])
record = env['hr.operation'].sudo().search([('workplace_number','=','1912')])
vals = { 'name': 'get office msg', 'edi_type': env.ref('edi_af_officer.get_officer').id, 'model': record._name, 'res_id': record.id, 'route_id': route.id, 'route_type': 'edi_af_officer', }
